column4: is it possible to compile mplayer with w64codecs?  or aren't there very many 64codecs out there?  or do I need to compile mplayer for 32bit?
or you could just install the w64 codecs
I did and it didn't cut it, lacking codecs
it is a wmv file, and it complains about: Requested video codec family [wmsdmod] (vfm=dmo) not available.
